comment: Probably the worse education teacher I've ever had. She talks to us like we are kids and her tests are very specific. Can't miss more than 2 classes and they have to be excused or else she deducts 10% of your final grade.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Dr. Johnson is a great professor! She's always hyper and energetic and is really passionate about teaching. She has a pleasant sense of humor. I took her for 2110 and 2130.

Prof. Johnson is one of the most disrespectful teachers I've ever had. Her class work is not that bad, but the way she talks to her students and treats them is horrible. She does not care about the students outside of the classroom. She doesn't care about the students. Do yourself a favor and choose someone who actually is passionate about teaching
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--SO MANY PAPERS

comment: HATED Mrs. Johnson's class. She speaks down to everyone and teaches as if her students are in middle school. Super disrespectful. She used to be a principle and she runs her classroom like one, in all of the worst ways possible. She uses an annoying baby voice all the time& her tests are hard for no reason. Ridiculously hard grader. Miserable class

The class overall was pretty easy. Students are required to have 10 hours of observations, 3 mini papers, and 3-4 reflections for observations. Academically, I did learn a lot. She definitely knows her stuff. However, I did not appreciate the way she treated her students. I felt the class was often treated like a middle school class.

Dr. Johnson is a great professor.  She knows her stuff & is very enthusiastic about the class. She keeps class entertaining with her "peace & love!" Overall amazing professor.  I definitely recommend taking her class!

I don't know where the few people who don't like her on here were during this class, but she is AWESOME.  She's hyper, funny and her assignments are very simple. I got an A without putting forth too much effort. Attendance is required or she deducts points! But otherwise, I learned a lot about teaching passionately from her! Peace & Love!
This teacher is awesome. She is super funny and entertaining. Her requirements are easy and clear. She teaches the information that is on the test and gives as much help as she can.

Although she is a very energetic teacher, she tends to go off topic ALOT...i had a hard time with her quizzes because she would have stuff on there that we discussed for 2 seconds before she started talking about stuff completely unrelated. she's really nice, but don't expect to turn in anything late, she won't take it...

Dr. Johnson is the most hypocritical mad angry black woman on this campus.  She probably lost her principal job due to her lack of understanding in that role.  She is the most unfair, scattered professor I have ever had the misfortune of taking.  DO NOT take her.  I promise you will regret it.

I had this class once per week so it was a long class but she kept it interesting by mixing up the activities. She is passionate about teaching. She does not allow talking in class while she is speaking so don't even attempt it. Demands respect.

Dr Johnson is fabulous! She is so energetic and funny. Even if youre not really sure whats shes talking about, youll get a good grade if you do the work and READ!! I really enjoyed her class and would love to take her again.
Helpful and energetic. Sometimes she can be a little bit odd, but at least it adds some vigor to the class. Not a lot of classroom discussion though.

I had this woman at 8am, and I don't know how she does it. I swear she shots up caffeine before class, but a lovely women. She is really clear about what is needed, and gives way too much time for projects. Always helpful if you ask, but don't even try to turn in your field experience late, because she won't want it. And there is 35% of your grade.

THIS LADY IS GREAT!! IF u want an easy A i sooo recommend her. yeah she's a bit energetic, but i'd rather one than a "bueler, bueler". get involved and she loves to hear your opinions and feel free to open your own discussions that are related to the subject of course and when she is not speaking. i really enjoyed her class!!!

VERY ENERGETIC, sometimes too energetic at 8 am. She does tend to treat you like you are in middle school, but she is a good teacher. The material is easy, but she does not let you turn in ANY assignments, even if you were absent. Attendance is mandatory, if you miss more than 2 classes it affects your final grade. Nice lady though.

She is so amazing! I loved this class and she really showed someone that loves teaching! Just go to class and the assignments are easy. There's a midterm and i final but they are super easy and she gives you a really good studyguide! TAKE HER!!
Cares more about following directions on assignments than content.  Talks to you like you are 5 years old. Very Irritating, but easy A.
SHE DOES HAVE LOTS OF ENERGY. IF YOU ASK A QUESTION EXPECT A DETAILED RESPONSE. LOTS OF WORK BUT NOT HARD TESTS
She is amazing! She makes it all so interesting..I highly recommend taking her if you have the chance to.

Dr. Johnson is so energetic, she makes things so fun! I really enjoyed her class. I believe there were only two tests, but there were a good bit of other assignments, including group work. I still recommend her. Highly. Peace and Love everyone!!!

Dr. Salyer is adorable! She is so sweet, and very helpful. She also is one of the only teachers I've ever had that realizes her class isn't the only one. If you don't make a deadline, don't freak. She will give you extra time if you ask her.
Lively professor. Participate and do the work and an A should be in the bag.

I am currently taking EDUC 2110 from Dr. Johnson, and I must say she is PHENONMINAL!  She is very engaging, and she cares about her students success.  I love this teacher!  She is extremely intelligent, classy, and respectful of her students.  So, STUDENTS, be RESPECTFUL of her; she deserves respect!

She made a boring class fun and engaging. I had her before with 2201 and she is just as cool as then. There is alot of reading and paper writing in this class, so be aware, most of the class is on educational theory and multicultural teaching methods. She is AWESOME! She is one of my very favorite professors here.
She was great.  She knew about what she was teaching and was very helpful.  The projects and assignments were very easy.  I would definitely take her if I had another chance.

She is wonderful. Show up to class and speak up. She likes people to talk in her class. This helps her to remember your name and you will want her to remember your name when evaluation time comes. She is funny and engaging. She even made my 11 year old son laugh.

Very passionate professor! She is a character! "Peace & Love" is her fav quote! The only thing that I found hard about her class was getting up and going to it (8am), but attendance is mandatory! Interesting class! Take her!
She was an AWESOME teacher.  She is all about Peace and Love (you know what i'm talking about once you take her class).  Very flexible and upbeat.  I would take any other classes taught by her.
